initMessages: Cybercriminals are on the lookout for any mistakes we make to gain access to our banking and personal information.
Drag the relevant actions to protect your data from theft.
name: Cybersecurity

corrects.text: Always browse from the search engine, not from suspicious links.
Verify that the site is secure (https)
Install an antivirus and keep updates up to date
Do not download files from suspicious emails
Do not share passwords in chats and social networks

falses.text: Use a single password for all accounts
Sharing passwords in chats and social networks
Access links in emails from unknown sender
